room_title: Escape room "Escape the Office" by Escape Challenge St. Louis in St. Louis
review: First escape room that I've ever done. It was great! A lot of great Office jokes sprinkled throughout, but you don't need to be familiar with the show to succeed.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Office" by Escape Challenge St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We love the Office, and so do the people who made this room, obviously! It was so fun and the attention to detail was excellent! Wish we could do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Office" by Escape Challenge St. Louis in St. Louis
review: This place is incredible and so worth it! We did the Escape the Office room and it is a must for die hard Office fans. We hope to make it back soon! Kat was very friendly as well! The puzzles were challenging and fun. We will be talking about this for years!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Office" by Escape Challenge St. Louis in St. Louis
review: My friends and I did The Office escape room last night and had so much fun! The attention to details as an Office fan was AWESOME! The puzzles were challenging but fun. You don't have to know anything about the show to complete the room. We were able to escape with one second left.Roberta was amazing! She didn't rush us out even though there was a group after us. She let us take our time so we could geek out and take a bunch of pictures! We talked about it the rest of the night! We came from 2 1/2 hours away for this specific room and it was totally worth the drive! We have already said that we are for sure going back!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Office" by Escape Challenge St. Louis in St. Louis
review: We did The Office room tonight and we were blown away at how awesome it was! So many fun little details that related to the show but not impossible for our friends who donâ€™t watch the show. Friendly staff and great atmosphere! Will be going back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Office" by Escape Challenge St. Louis in St. Louis
review: The Office room is excellent. The aesthetic in the entire building is really neat and quirky. The office escape room was full of neat surprises and the puzzles were great!
